languages.text: "О, я и так все знаю. Хотя вы и эффективно {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusVistenzaDead}избавились{/d} от всех свидетельств, способных указать на просчет династии фон Валанциус. Печально осознавать, что с попустительства Вольного Торговца к власти пришла еретичка, которая не один год пестовала свой культ".

traits.locale_text: "Инквизиция одобряет радикальные методы, которыми вы очистили Янус. Истребление ксеносов и смещение с поста губернатора Вьятт стабилизировали обстановку на планете".

languages.text: "Oh, I know it already. Even though you were quite effective at {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusVistenzaDead}removing{/d} all evidence that could point to the blunder made by House von Valancius. It is saddening to realise that the Rogue Trader's connivance allowed a heretic who had been fostering a cult for years to come to power."
languages.original_text: "О, я и так все знаю. Хотя вы и эффективно {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusVistenzaDead}избавились{/d} от всех свидетельств, способных указать на просчет династии фон Валанциус. Печально осознавать, что с попустительства Вольного Торговца к власти пришла еретичка, которая не один год пестовала свой культ".

traits.locale_text: "Oh, I know it all already. Even though you were quite effective at removing all evidence that could point to the blunder made by House von Valancius. It is saddening to realise that the Rogue Trader's connivance allowed a heretic who had been fostering a cult for years to come to power."

languages.text: 「ああ、万事承知している。フォン・ヴァランシウス家がしでかした失態を示す全ての証拠を{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusVistenzaDead}隠滅{/d}するほどの影響力がお前にあるとしてもだ。何年にもわたって権力を握っていた狂信者どもを育てた異端に対し、自由開拓者が見て見ぬ振りをするとは、実に残念だ」
languages.original_text: "Oh, I know it already. Even though you were quite effective at {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusVistenzaDead}removing{/d} all evidence that could point to the blunder made by House von Valancius. It is saddening to realise that the Rogue Trader's connivance allowed a heretic who had been fostering a cult for years to come to power."

languages.original_text: "Oh, I know it all already. Even though you were quite effective at removing all evidence that could point to the blunder made by House von Valancius. It is saddening to realise that the Rogue Trader's connivance allowed a heretic who had been fostering a cult for years to come to power."

languages.text: “噢，尽管你费尽心思，{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusVistenzaDead}抹掉{/d}了所有可能会用来指控冯·瓦兰修斯家族玩忽职守的证据，可我还是都知道了。那个异端分子多年来一直都在组建邪教，而正是行商浪人的心存纵容，才让那个异端分子大权在握，这真是太可悲了。”
languages.original_text: "Oh, I know it already. Even though you were quite effective at {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusVistenzaDead}removing{/d} all evidence that could point to the blunder made by House von Valancius. It is saddening to realise that the Rogue Trader's connivance allowed a heretic who had been fostering a cult for years to come to power."

traits.locale_text: “噢，尽管你费尽心思，抹掉了所有可能会用来指控冯·瓦兰修斯家族玩忽职守的证据，可我还是都知道了。那个异端分子多年来一直都在组建邪教，而正是行商浪人的心存纵容，才让那个异端分子大权在握，这真是太可悲了。”

languages.text: «Sí, estoy informado de ese asunto. Aunque {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusVistenzaDead}eliminó{/d} concienzudamente toda prueba que señalara al error cometido por la casa von Valancius. Es triste ver que la connivencia de un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente había permitido que una hereje que llevaba años fomentando un culto alcanzara el poder».
languages.original_text: "Oh, I know it already. Even though you were quite effective at {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusVistenzaDead}removing{/d} all evidence that could point to the blunder made by House von Valancius. It is saddening to realise that the Rogue Trader's connivance allowed a heretic who had been fostering a cult for years to come to power."

traits.locale_text: «Sí, estoy informado de todo ese asunto. Aunque eliminó concienzudamente toda prueba que señalara al error cometido por la casa von Valancius. Es triste ver que la connivencia de un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente había permitido que una hereje que llevaba años fomentando un culto alcanzara el poder».

languages.text: « Oh, je suis déjà au courant, malgré tous les efforts que vous avez déployés pour faire {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusVistenzaDead}disparaître{/d} les preuves de l'énorme bévue commise par la maison von Valancius. Quelle tristesse de voir que les manigances {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} ont permis à une hérétique, membre d'un sombre culte depuis des années, de prendre le pouvoir. »
languages.original_text: "Oh, I know it already. Even though you were quite effective at {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusVistenzaDead}removing{/d} all evidence that could point to the blunder made by House von Valancius. It is saddening to realise that the Rogue Trader's connivance allowed a heretic who had been fostering a cult for years to come to power."

traits.locale_text: « Oh, je suis déjà au courant, malgré tous les efforts que vous avez déployés pour faire {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusVistenzaDead}disparaître{/d} les preuves de l'énorme bévue commise par la maison von Valancius. Quelle tristesse de voir que les manigances {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} ont permis à une hérétique, membre d'un sombre culte depuis des années, de prendre le pouvoir. »

languages.text: "Oh, das weiß ich bereits. Obwohl Ihr recht geschickt sämtliche Beweise {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusVistenzaDead}entfernt{/d} habt, die auf ein Fehlverhalten des Hauses von Valancius schließen ließen. Es ist traurig, dass die Begünstigung durch die Freihändlerin einer Ketzerin zur Macht verholfen hat, die seit Jahren einen Kult betreibt."
languages.original_text: "Oh, I know it already. Es ist traurig, dass die Begünstigung durch die Freihändlerin einer Ketzerin zur Macht verholfen hat, die seit Jahren einen Kult betreibt."

languages.text: "Hah, biliyorum zaten. Von Valancius Hanesi'nin yaptığı yanlışlara dair tüm kanıtları oldukça efektif bir şekilde {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusVistenzaDead}silmiş olmana{/d} rağmen biliyorum. Yıllarca bir tarikata arka çıkmış bir kâfirin güç kazanma sebebinin, Hür Tacir'in buna göz yummuş olması olduğunu görmek gerçekten üzüntü verici."
languages.original_text: "Oh, I know it already. It is saddening to realise that the Rogue Trader's connivance allowed a heretic who had been fostering a cult for years to come to power."

traits.locale_text: "Hah, biliyorum zaten.
